{"id":971651030,"question_id":2787,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1686809127,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/971651030/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Movement of Robots","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumDistance(int[] nums, String s, int d) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n            \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n\n            if(ch=='R'){\n                nums[i]+=d;\n\n            }else{\n                nums[i]-=d;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int M = (int) 1e9+7;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n//         -3, -1, 1\n        \n//           ans = 0, pre=-3\n//           ans = 1*-1-(-3)-(0)  = 2, pre = -4\n//           ans = 2+2*1-(-4) = 8, pre=-3\n              \n//               return \n              \n             \n            \n        long res=0;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len-1;i++){\n            \n            int dis = nums[i+1] - nums[i];\n            res = res + ((i+1)*dis*(len-i-1))%M;\n            res %=M;\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return (int)res;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n//         long res =0;\n//         for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n//             for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n//                 res = res + Math.abs(nums[i]-nums[j])%M;\n//                 res%=M;\n//             }\n//         }\n        \n        // return (int)res;\n        \n       \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"movement-of-robots","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
